message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only pay up to $9000 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a little closer to my initial price.  I'm willing to go down to $9250. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $9100. This is the highest amount I can afford for your product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
